mapper.update:
update houses

house_type = #{houseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rent_type = #{rentType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

buy_time = #{buyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
nums = #{nums,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
